attributes.action: change the voting age to 16 because you can do alot of things at 16 like fly a plane, buy a house but not vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that 16 year olds should be able to vote because they pay taxes so they are muture enough to vote. if you agree with me please sign this petition. thank you. please do not phone the telephone number provided as it is my old number i will update it as soon as i can. if you need to get hold of me email me at Warns016@medway.org.uk

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
